genericDescription: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
partialData: Not all data could be loaded
maximumResultLimitExceeded: The maximum number of results for paging is: {MAX_RESULTS}. Please refine your search or use the download option to access all results.
mapBrowserIssue: If the problem persists, it is most likely because of browser extensions or settings preventing the use of required APIs (e.g. WebGL and Canvas).
webglUnavailable: WebGL is not available. Please check your browser settings or try a different browser. Plugins or extensions may also block WebGL.
